name: Diana
description: Telegram's fastet and powerfull group manager. Modular Telegram group management bot!

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable env variables. Make sure you know the code

MONGODB_URI.description: Optional: Link of mongodb database. Recommended to fill this if you use unlimited filters

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode messages

URL.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: optional: a chat where your replied saved messages are stored, to stop people deleting their old

SUDO_USERS.description: List of user_ids which should be considered sudo users

SUPPORT_USERS.description: List of user_ids which should be considered support users who can ban/gban users.

WHITELIST_USERS.description: List of user_ids which can't be banned.

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks

DEL_CMDS.description: Whether to delete commands from users which don't have rights to use that command

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Whether to allow using exclamation marks ! for commands as well as /.

BAN_STICKER.description: Optional: Which sticker to use when banning people.

BMERNU_SCUT_SRELFTI.description: This will set the filter limit. Set it 0 for unlimited filters
